BR_text.BRsummary: Multinomial float16 is broken since a recent change to the Cast transformer
BR_text.BRdescription:
Multinomial float16 throws an exception since a <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/onnxruntime/pull/4523>recent change to the Cast transformer</denchmark-link>
 
 
 Run inference the following model: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/onnxruntime/files/4990832/multinomial_float16.zip>multinomial_float16.zip</denchmark-link>
 
 Expected behavior
 The model completes inference without throwing an exception
 Additional context
 The change to the Cast transformer sets the output types of nodes who have a "dtype" attribute to float, but Multinomial is a special case that outputs only int32 or int64 tensors. Therefore, an exception is thrown during inference.

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks, I ll take a look at this.
